title: The Cigarette Consumption Panel Data Set
description:
Description
a panel of 48 observations  from 1985  to 1995
number of observations :  528
observation :  regional
country :  United States

parameters.tax: average state, federal, and average local excise taxes for fiscal year
parameters.avgprs: average price during fiscal year, including sales taxes
parameters.taxs: average excise taxes for fiscal year, including sales taxes
